ti:work.ti:title: Compendium argumenti Stoicos absurdiora poetis dicere

ti:translation.ti:label: A breviate of a discourse, showing that the Stoics speak greater improbabilities than the poets.
ti:translation.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarch's Morals, Vol. 3. Goodwin, William W., editor; Baxter, William, translator. Boston: Little, Brown, and Company. Cambridge. 1874.

ti:edition.ti:label: Σύνοψις τοῦ ὅτι παραδοξότερα οἱ Στωικοὶ τῶν ποιητῶν λέγουσι
ti:edition.ti:description: Plutarch. Plutarchi Chaeronensis Moralia, Vol 6. Vernardakēs, Grēgorios N., editor. Leipzig: Teubner. 1895.
